document_data.name: ''Daystar''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Daystar''''' was a [[magic]]al [[longsword]] that was favored by the [[Church of Torm]], used by his followers in their battles against the [[undead]].
document_data.Powers: The ''+2 longsword'' was more potent when wielded against evil beings and extremely destructive to the undead. Once per day, its wielder could cast the spell ''[[sunray]]''. It was unknown if this boon was imbued into the blade during the [[item enchantment|enchantment process]] or was divinely granted from Torm himself.
document_data.History: While the exact origins of the sword were unknown, it had long been used in the service of the god of duty and loyalty.
